experience.title: Full Stack Developer . PIYES.COM - Casablanca
experience.description: Developing full-stack features with Laravel backend (REST API) and Vue.js/Nuxt.js frontend. Implementing CI/CD pipelines with GitLab and managing environments using Docker, Portainer, Redis, and MinIO. Contributing to code reviews, bug resolution, and technical documentation.
